GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: During 2022, Omidyar Network Services LLC, a subsidiary of Omidyar Network LLC, provided general and administrative support staff and paid for professional legal costs on behalf of the Foundation. In addition, other affiliated entities and related parties provided in-kind services related to investment management and travel. The amount of contributed services is valued at $15,405,191 but not recorded on Form 990 PF.
